import React, { useCallback } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router' import { auth } from '../../firebase' import './Forms.css' function Forms({history}) { const handleSignup = useCallback( async e => { event.preventDefault() const { email, password } = e.target.elements try{ await auth .createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email.value, password.value) history.push('/new-order') } catch(err) { alert(err) } }, [history]) return(


) } export default withRouter(Forms)
